name: Blanche feeds Kali until she falls asleep
name_original: Blanche feeds Kali until she falls asleep
description:
Kali is hurt, and needs some extra help getting food. Bring her some hay each time she gets hungry. You can treat yourself to some of the hay too by repeatedly pressing "E". When it's nap time, then you did your job! Go ahead and hit enter when Kali is sleeping.

I'm not really into the idea of receiving any donations for this little project, but if you really like what I made, please consider supporting the rodent rescue where I adopted Kali and my other guinea pigs. Click here to donate to the Pipsqueakery.
